contents.content:
[{
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Have you guys heard about this? Harry from class 2 confessed to Miss A again today",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Watermelon",
    "Avatar": "fruit_watermelon",
    "Time": "PM 21:57"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Again? Didn't he get turned down before",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Banana",
    "Avatar": "fruit_banana",
    "Time": "PM 21:57"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Well, he felt that since she forgot about everything, maybe he has another chance",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Apple",
    "Avatar": "fruit_apple",
    "Time": "PM 21:57"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Can't believe that there are still people who think that memory loss thing is true",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Grape",
    "Avatar": "fruit_grape",
    "Time": "PM 21:57"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Yeah, suffers memory loss yet still gets top scores in every subject, Bull f.... s... She got a full score on her continuation exam too. Isn't that absurd",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Watermelon",
    "Avatar": "fruit_watermelon",
    "Time": "PM 21:58"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Told you that this is setting up for her idol career. Artists with some kind of *tragicbackstory* like this will bring it up whenever they are losing popularity",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Pear",
    "Avatar": "fruit_pear",
    "Time": "PM 21:58"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Agreed. People don't care about the truth anyway. Good looks get you everything",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Apple",
    "Avatar": "fruit_apple",
    "Time": "PM 21:58"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 0,
    "Content": "Anonymous Coconut has joined the message group"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "? Who's this",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Banana",
    "Avatar": "fruit_banana",
    "Time": "PM 21:59"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Doesn't this message group only has people from our class?",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Pear",
    "Avatar": "fruit_pear",
    "Time": "PM 21:59"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Nope. There are plenty of people who hate Miss A in other classes",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Watermelon",
    "Avatar": "fruit_watermelon",
    "Time": "PM 21:59"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "We're anonymous anyway. Doesn't matter who it is",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Grape",
    "Avatar": "fruit_grape",
    "Time": "PM 21:59"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 1,
    "Content": "I saw her playing the piano in the music classroom a few days ago.",
    "Avatar": "fruit_coconut",
    "Time": "PM 22:00"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Wow, that's quite the news you have for your first message",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Watermelon",
    "Avatar": "fruit_watermelon",
    "Time": "PM 22:00"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "U serious? Not only does she cheat in tests but she plays the piano too? What is this witchcraft",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Apple",
    "Avatar": "fruit_apple",
    "Time": "PM 22:00"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Did she really lose her memory? LOL",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Banana",
    "Avatar": "fruit_banana",
    "Time": "PM 22:01"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Doesn't remember any names yet still remembers how to play the piano",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Grape",
    "Avatar": "fruit_grape",
    "Time": "PM 22:01"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "My guess is that those three plates on her head are also just for show",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Watermelon",
    "Avatar": "fruit_watermelon",
    "Time": "PM 22:01"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Maybe she thinks it's *fashionable* LMFAO",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Pear",
    "Avatar": "fruit_pear",
    "Time": "PM 22:01"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 1,
    "Content": "She did file an application to the system. If not for that, it's against the rules to wear any accessory besides the uniform.",
    "Avatar": "fruit_coconut",
    "Time": "PM 22:01"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Let's take it off and see what happens",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Banana",
    "Avatar": "fruit_banana",
    "Time": "PM 22:01"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Anyone wants to join??",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Pear",
    "Avatar": "fruit_pear",
    "Time": "PM 22:02"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Why not",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Grape",
    "Avatar": "fruit_grape",
    "Time": "PM 22:02"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 1,
    "Content": "Quick advise; don't do anything too serious. A while ago, someone got deducted 20 points by the system when they pushed her to the ground.",
    "Avatar": "fruit_coconut",
    "Time": "PM 22:02"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "It wasn't even that hard of a push",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Watermelon",
    "Avatar": "fruit_watermelon",
    "Time": "PM 22:02"
  },
  {
    "MessageType": 2,
    "Content": "Miss A is an idol ya know, she's precious",
    "UserName": "Anonymous Apple",
    "Avatar": "fruit_apple",
    "Time": "PM 22:02"
  }]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "聞いた？隣のクラスのHarryがAに告ったらしいよ","UserName": "匿名スイカ","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "また？前振られたばっかじゃん","UserName": "匿名バナナ","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "忘れてるからチャンスあると思ったんじゃん？？","UserName": "匿名リンゴ","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "記憶喪失信じてるやつがいんの？ウケる","UserName": "匿名ブドウ","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "記憶喪失の人はあんなにいい成績とれませーん
誰が信じるんだって話
進級テストも満点だったらしいよ
ありえないっしょ","UserName": "匿名スイカ","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "だから将来売れるための布石だって言ってんじゃん","UserName": "匿名ナシ","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "だね 誰もそれが真実かどうかなんて気にしないんだろうね
世の中顔だね","UserName": "匿名リンゴ","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "匿名ココナッツが入室しました"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "？
誰これ","UserName": "匿名バナナ","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "このグループってうちのクラスの人しかいないよね","UserName": "匿名ナシ","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "いや？他のクラスにもA嫌いな子いっぱいいるよ","UserName": "匿名スイカ","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "匿名なんだし誰でもよくね","UserName": "匿名ブドウ","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "この前音楽室でピアノ弾いてた","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "お、入って来て即情報ありー","UserName": "匿名スイカ","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "まじ？テストはズルするわピアノは弾くわwウケる","UserName": "匿名リンゴ","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "本当に記憶喪失なんですかー？","UserName": "匿名バナナ","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "クラスメイトも思い出せないのに、ピアノの弾き方は覚えてるんだね","UserName": "匿名ブドウ","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "あの頭の上の皿みたいなやつも、かわいいからつけてるだけっしょ","UserName": "匿名スイカ","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "勘違い乙","UserName": "匿名ナシ","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "申請はしてるよ
じゃなきゃ制服以外の装飾は禁止だし","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "実際あれ取っても何ともなさそう","UserName": "匿名バナナ","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "誰かやってみてよ","UserName": "匿名ナシ","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "それな","UserName": "匿名ブドウ","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "あんまりやりすぎない方がいいよ
この前あの子のこと突き飛ばした人が20点減点されてた","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "そんなに力入れてないっつの","UserName": "匿名スイカ","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Aは演技派だからね","UserName": "匿名リンゴ","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:02"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "你們有聽說嗎? 今天隔壁班的Harry又跟A小姐告白耶","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "又來? 他之前不是被打槍過","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "啊就覺得他忘了 可能還有機會啊","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "居然還有一堆人相信她失憶 太誇張","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "失憶成績還有辦法那麼好喔 鬼才信
他升學考也滿分耶 不覺得很扯嗎","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "就跟你們說為了以後當偶像鋪路啊
這種有點背景故事的藝人 紅不起來就會拿悽慘身世來炒新聞","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "對阿, 反正現在人也不再忽事情真假 人正真好","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "[匿名椰子 加入聊天群組]"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "？
這誰ㄚ","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "這群組也只有我們班的吧?","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "沒有喔 別班也有超多討厭 A小姐的人","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "都匿名了 是誰不重要吧","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我前幾天看到她在音樂教室彈鋼琴。","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哇 一進來就有大爆料","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的假的? 考試還可以作弊 彈鋼琴太扯了啦","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的有失憶嗎? 哈哈","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "人都不記得還記得怎麼彈琴","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我看他頭上那三個盤子也是戴好看的","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哈哈 自以為潮耶","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "她有跟系統申請，不然制服以外的裝飾算是違反規定。","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "拿掉也不會怎樣吧","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "有沒有人要去確認一下啊??","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "走阿","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "別做太過份的事情比較好，之前有人推倒她被系統扣了 20 點。","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "明明沒推那麼用力好不好","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "A 小姐就演技派啊 人家偶像內","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:02"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "너희들 소식 들었어? 오늘 옆반 Harry가 또 A한테 고백한 거?","UserName": "익명의 수박님","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "또? 걔 예전에도 차이지 않았냐?","UserName": "익명의 바나나님","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "아마 기억이 없어졌으니 다시 도전한 거 아닐까?","UserName": "익명의 사과님","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "설마 아직도 걔가 진짜로 기억상실에 걸린거 라고 믿고 있는 사람이 있다니.","UserName": "익명의 포도님","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "기억상실 걸렸다는 애가 성적이 그렇게 좋아? 귀신 씨나락 까먹는 소리지. 월반 시험도 만점이라던데, 완전 어이없어.","UserName": "익명의 수박님","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "미래를 위한 포석이겠지.
원래 아이돌은 그런 스토리 하나쯤은 억지로라도 있어야 하잖아. 감성 코드로 몰아가려는 거지 뭐.","UserName": "익명의 배님","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "맞아. 팩트인지 아닌지 제대로 따지려는 사람이 몇이나 있겠어","UserName": "익명의 사과님","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "익명의 야자수님이 대화방에 참여"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "?
누구지?","UserName": "익명의 바나나님","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "여기 대화방에 우리 반 애들만 있는 거 아니었어?","UserName": "익명의 배님","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "아님. 다른 반 애들도 A 완전 싫어하거든","UserName": "익명의 수박님","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "어차피 익명인데 누구인지가 중요한가?","UserName": "익명의 포도님","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "며칠 전에 걔가 음악실에서 피아노 치는 거 봤음","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "와 들어오자마자 흥미진진","UserName": "익명의 수박님","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "레알? 부정행위로 시험까지 보면서 피아노까지 치고 앉았다니 대단하다","UserName": "익명의 사과님","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "걔 진짜 기억상실 맞아? 하하","UserName": "익명의 바나나님","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "기억이 없다면서 피아노 치는 법은 기억하시나 보네?","UserName": "익명의 포도님","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "머리에 쟁반같은 거 3개 달고 다니는데 그래도 이쁘긴 이쁘더라","UserName": "익명의 수박님","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "하하하 자기가 무슨 유행의 선두주자라도 되는 줄 아는가 보지","UserName": "익명의 배님","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "시스템에 신청은 한 거겠지? 교복 이외에 액세서리는 규정 위반이니깐","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "떼어버려도 별일 없지 않을까","UserName": "익명의 바나나님","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "나서서 확인해 볼 용자 없냐??","UserName": "익명의 배님","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "가즈아아!","UserName": "익명의 포도님","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "딱 너무하다 싶지 않을 정도로만 해야 함. 예전에 누가 걔 밀었다가 20점 감점 먹었음","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "그렇게 세게 민 것도 아니었다고!","UserName": "익명의 수박님","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "A는 원래 타고난 연기파임","UserName": "익명의 사과님","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:02"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "你們有聽說嗎? 今天隔壁班的Harry又跟A小姐告白耶","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "又來? 他之前不是被打槍過","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "啊就覺得他忘了 可能還有機會啊","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "居然還有一堆人相信她失憶 太誇張","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:57"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "失憶成績還有辦法那麼好喔 鬼才信
他升學考也滿分耶 不覺得很扯嗎","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "就跟你們說為了以後當偶像鋪路啊
這種有點背景故事的藝人 紅不起來就會拿悽慘身世來炒新聞","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "對阿, 反正現在人也不再忽事情真假 人正真好","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 21:58"},{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "[匿名椰子 加入聊天群組]"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "？
這誰呀","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "這群組也只有我們班的吧?","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "沒有喔 別班也有超多討厭 A小姐的人","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "都匿名了 是誰不重要吧","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 21:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我前幾天看到她在音樂教室彈鋼琴。","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哇 一進來就有大爆料","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的假的? 考試還可以作弊 彈鋼琴太扯了啦","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:00"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的有失憶嗎? 哈哈","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "人都不記得還記得怎麼彈琴","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我看他頭上那三個盤子也是戴好看的","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哈哈 自以為潮耶","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "她有跟系統申請，不然制服以外的裝飾算是違反規定。","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "拿掉也不會怎樣吧","UserName": "匿名香蕉","Avatar": "fruit_banana","Time": "PM 22:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "有沒有人要去確認一下啊??","UserName": "匿名梨子","Avatar": "fruit_pear","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "走阿","UserName": "匿名葡萄","Avatar": "fruit_grape","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "別做太過份的事情比較好，之前有人推倒她被系統扣了 20 點。","Avatar": "fruit_coconut","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "明明沒推那麼用力好不好","UserName": "匿名西瓜","Avatar": "fruit_watermelon","Time": "PM 22:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "A 小姐就演技派啊 人家偶像耶","UserName": "匿名蘋果","Avatar": "fruit_apple","Time": "PM 22:02"}]
